sentences.english: Eventually you will come to Jinghsen Qanyie Road and the moat and wall of the Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 路的盡頭就是緊靠故宮城牆和護城河的景山前街。

sentences.english: A firewall is like the moat surrounding a castle.
sentences.chinese: 防火牆就象是城堡邊上的護城河。

sentences.english: The strongest moat you can build is one based on strong relationships.
sentences.chinese: 你能建的最堅不可摧的護城河是建立在牢固的關係上。

sentences.english: Haohe River is one of the four city moats well reserved presently in China.
sentences.chinese: 濠河爲我國目前保存最好的四條護城河之一。

sentences.english: The city site has city wall and moat surround with two ditches.
sentences.chinese: 該城址擁有城牆和護城河，另有內外雙重圍壕。

sentences.english: Stock with companies with wide " moats ".
The buildings are surrounded by a six-meter-deep moat and a ten- meter-high wall.
sentences.chinese: 那些建築物被六米深的護城河與十米高的城牆包圍着。

sentences.english: Xijiang River is one part of Huangyan old moat .
sentences.chinese: 黃岩西江河是黃岩老護城河的一部分。

sentences.english: Morningstar calls this edge a "wide moat.
sentences.chinese: 晨星稱這種優勢爲“寬護城河”。

sentences.english: They built a moat to encompass the castle.
sentences.chinese: 他們在城堡周圍修了一條護城河。

sentences.english: And day after day, the once beautiful moat has turned into a smelly dustbin.
sentences.chinese: 日復一日，漂亮的護城河已經變成一個惡臭的垃圾箱。
選擇少有“護城河”的公司。

sentences.english: The moat around our city has been seriously polluted recently.
sentences.chinese: 我們城市周圍的護城河最近被嚴重污染了。

sentences.english: Look, there are two moats over there.
sentences.chinese: 你看，兩邊還有兩條護城河呢。

definition: strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
Xincheng District of Xi'an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Xincheng District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
